sentences.en: Calligraphy class frame beat class ancient kite class thespian performance class.
sentences.cn: 书法班、架子鼓班、古筝班、戏剧表演班等。

sentences.en: Double rhythms, resounding through the lyric depiction and connecting with each other , indicate the thespian place of mankind and the cognition of the writer to this thespian place.
sentences.cn: 这双重旋律互为表里, 表明了人类的某种悲剧性处境以及作家对这种悲剧性处境的感受和认识.

sentences.en: If you enjoy acting in plays , join your school's thespian club.
sentences.cn: 如果你喜欢戏剧表演，就加入你学校的戏剧社团。

sentences.en: If you enjoy acting in plays, join your school's thespian club.
sentences.cn: 如果你喜欢戏剧表演, 就加入你学校的戏剧社团.

sentences.en: She enjoys acting in plays and joined the school's thespian club.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢戏剧表演,而且还加入了学校的戏剧社团.

sentences.en: The actress demonstrated thespian talents at her first audition.
sentences.cn: 这位女演员第一次试镜就展现出戏剧天分。

sentences.en: The movie director had thespian cooperation.
sentences.cn: 这个电影导演具有导演悲剧作品的天赋.

trans.tran_cn: (古希腊雅典诗人, 悲剧创始者)泰斯庇斯的, 悲剧的, 戏剧的, 悲剧性的
trans.tran_en: Thespian means relating to drama and the theatre
